missing.title: Page not found
missing.description: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.

application.title: Arslan Weather Service
application.description: Just type down your city name to see the weather details.

openweather.title: OpenWeather global services
openweather.description: Weather forecasts, nowcasts and history in fast and elegant way
openweather.title_first: We make hyper-local weather data open for any business
openweather.description_first: For each point on the globe, we provide historical, current and forecasted weather data via light-speed APIs.
openweather.title_second: From small companies to Top 100 Fortune
openweather.description_second: 4,000,000 API | 2,500 new users every day | 2 billion requests a day
openweather.description_third: Customers from different industries benefit from our weather data
openweather.description_fourth: OpenWeather is a team of IT experts and data scientists that has been practicing deep weather data science since 2014.

nextjs.banner: Building Blocks of a Web Application
nextjs.title: What is Next.js?
nextjs.description: Next.js is a flexible React framework that gives you building blocks to create fast web applications.
nextjs.description_first: how users will consume and interact with your application.
nextjs.description_second: where your data lives and how to get it.
nextjs.description_third: where you deploy, store, and run your application code (Serverless, CDN, Edge, etc).

tailwind.banner: Rapidly build modern websites without ever leaving your HTML.
tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: Tailwind CSS is an open source CSS framework. The main feature of this library is that, unlike other CSS frameworks like Bootstrap, it does not provide a series of predefined classes for elements such as buttons or tables.
tailwind.title_first: An API for your design system.
tailwind.description_first: Utility classes help you work within the constraints of a system instead of littering your stylesheets with arbitrary values. They make it easy to be consistent with color choices, spacing, typography, shadows, and everything else that makes up a well-engineered design system.
tailwind.description_second: Because Tailwind is so low-level, it never encourages you to design the same site twice. Even with the same color palette and sizing scale, it's easy to build the same component with a completely different look in the next project.
tailwind.description_third: Because Tailwind is so low-level, it never encourages you to design the same site twice. Even with the same color palette and sizing scale, it's easy to build the same component with a completely different look in the next project.
